Question: Shenzhen Utopia-Originality Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Utopia Originality Technology Co.,Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Specializes in mobile power/charging treasure, energy storage equipment research, production, and sales
- ISO9001 quality standard certification and CE certification for charging treasure products
- Monthly output of 600,000 units of charging treasures with battery raw materials sourced from military enterprises such as Fengfan and Lishen
- Innovative design, leading functionality, and quality assurance
- Known for polymer charging treasure series, with sales in 18 countries or regions
- Notable products include power banks, wireless chargers, and charging cables
Summary_cn:
深圳乌托邦原创科技有限公司

2024年国际消费电子展(CES)产品亮点：

• 专注于移动电源/充电宝和储能设备的研发、生产和销售
• 拥有ISO9001质量标准认证以及充电宝产品的CE认证
• 每月生产六十万套充电宝，电池原材料主要来自风帆和力神等军工企业
• 创新设计，领先功能和质量保证
• 以聚合物充电宝系列闻名，销售遍及18个国家或地区
• 知名产品包括移动电源、无线充电器和充电线缆
